class pyqt.Course(course_name, instructor_id)[source]

Bases: object

A class representing a course.

Parameters

  • course_name (str) – The name of the course

  • instructor_id (int) – The ID of the instructor assigned to the course

class pyqt.Database(db_name='school1.db')[source]

Bases: object

The Database class manages the database connection and all CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for students, instructors, courses, and their associations.

Parameters

db_name (str, optional) – The name of the database file to connect to, defaults to ‘school1.db’

add_course(course)[source]

Adds a new course to the database if the instructor exists and the course name does not already exist.

Parameters

course (Course) – The course object containing course_name and instructor_id

Raises

sqlite3.IntegrityError – If the course name already exists

add_instructor(instructor)[source]

Adds a new instructor to the database after validating their email and age.

Parameters

instructor (Instructor) – The instructor object containing name, age, and email

Raises

sqlite3.IntegrityError – If an instructor with the same ID already exists

add_student(student)[source]

Adds a new student to the database after validating their email and age.

Parameters

student (Student) – The student object containing name, age, and email

Raises

sqlite3.IntegrityError – If a student with the same ID already exists

create_tables()[source]

Creates the necessary tables in the SQLite database if they do not already exist.

delete_course(course_id)[source]

Deletes a course from the database.

Parameters

course_id (int) – The ID of the course

delete_instructor(instructor_id)[source]

Deletes an instructor from the database.

Parameters

instructor_id (int) – The ID of the instructor

delete_student(student_id)[source]

Deletes a student from the database.

Parameters

student_id (int) – The ID of the student

get_course_id_by_name(course_name)[source]

Retrieves the course’s ID by its name.

Parameters

course_name (str) – The name of the course

Returns

The ID of the course, or None if not found

Return type

int or None

register_student_course(student_id, course_id)[source]

Registers a student for a course.

Parameters

  • student_id (int) – The ID of the student

  • course_id (int) – The ID of the course

Raises

sqlite3.IntegrityError – If the student is already registered for the course

show_error(title, message)[source]

Displays an error message box with the given title and message.

Parameters

  • title (str) – The title of the error message box

  • message (str) – The message to display

Displays an informational message box with the given title and message.

Parameters

  • message (str) – The message to display

Updates a course’s details.

Parameters

  • course_id (int) – The ID of the course

  • course_name (str) – The new name of the course

  • instructor_id (int) – The new ID of the instructor

Updates the instructor of a course.

Parameters

  • instructor_id (int) – The ID of the instructor

Updates an instructor’s details.

Parameters

  • name (str) – The new name of the instructor

  • age (int) – The new age of the instructor

  • age (int) – The new age of the student

validate_email(email)[source]

Validates the format of the given email using a regular expression.

Parameters

email (str) – The email to validate

Returns

True if the email format is valid, otherwise False

Return type

bool

class pyqt.SchoolManagementGUI[source]

Bases: QMainWindow

A PyQt GUI class to manage the School Management System.

This GUI allows the user to manage students, instructors, courses, student registrations, and assigning instructors to courses.

add_course()[source]

Adds a new course to the database using input from the UI.

add_instructor()[source]

Adds a new instructor to the database using input from the UI.

Creates the tab for assigning instructors to courses.

Creates the tab for managing courses (adding, editing, deleting, viewing).

Creates the tab for managing instructors (adding, editing, deleting, viewing).

Creates the tab for registering students to courses.

create_student_tab()[source]

Creates the tab for managing students (adding, editing, deleting, viewing).

Deletes the selected course from the database.

Initializes the UI with tabs for managing students, instructors, courses, and registrations.

Loads course and instructor data into dropdowns for assignment.

Loads all courses from the database and displays them in the course table.

Loads all instructors from the database and displays them in the instructor table.

Loads student and course data into dropdowns for registration.
